title: 12/12 Sparkling for Charity
desc: 6th Annual 12/12 Sparkling for Charity gala to benefit important LA non-profits and bring together leaders from the music, film, finance, banking and political communiities.? Open bar. Gift bags. Special performance. Silent auction and fun activities throughout the party! Attire:? Dress to impress and...please feel free to SPARKLE!! Guests are encouraged to "sparkle in your own unique way!" so feel free to?get creative!?Grand prizes for gentleman and lady who?wear "Most Creative Sparkling" outfits!
